description: The feature on this trail are: birding, dry river/creek, ocean views and wildflowers in spring.A short climb with rewarding views that the whole family can appreciate!  This is family friendly.
directions: Take the ferry boat to Channel Island National Park - Santa Rosa Island from Ventrua, CA.From the wide Soledad Road, you'll see the offshoot to the left for the Cherry Canyon Trail.
title: Cherry Canyon Trail
